pullrequest.title: Add installation guide for OSX from source

content.raw:
First pass looks good. I just want to take a closer look at how the branches of linux-from-source and mac-from-source kind of diverge then converge back at the “Getting the sources” section, and then kind of go in and out again. 

At the very least I want to add some sentences just indicating when those branches start and stop; at the most, it seems like they may need to be two different documents.

If you’re in a rush to merge, I can approve now and open another PR for all of that, or we can work on it together here.
content.html:
First pass looks good. I just want to take a closer look at how the branches of linux-from-source and mac-from-source kind of diverge then converge back at the “Getting the sources” section, and then kind of go in and out again.

At the very least I want to add some sentences just indicating when those branches start and stop; at the most, it seems like they may need to be two different documents.

If you’re in a rush to merge, I can approve now and open another PR for all of that, or we can work on it together here.
